commands.title: Insert or Update C/C++ Include Guard

enumDescriptions: Random GUID v4. Separeted by underscores.
File name of the current document. All non-alphanumeric characters are replaced with underscores.
File path of the current document. All non-alphanumeric characters are replaced with underscores.
C/C++ Include Guard.Macro Type.description: Source of include guard macros. GUID, Filename or File Path.

C/C++ Include Guard.Prevent Decimal.description: Prevent GUIDs from starting with a decimal number.

C/C++ Include Guard.Prefix.description: Prefix added to the include guard macros.

C/C++ Include Guard.Suffix.description: Suffix added to the include guard macros.

C/C++ Include Guard.Skip Comment Blocks.description: Insert the include guard beneath the first comment blocks.

C/C++ Include Guard.Shorten Underscores.description: Shorten multiple underscores in filenames or file paths.
